intent_atoms.description: Introduce hierarchical accessibility identifiers to the research log preview interfaces so QA automation can target audit components without relying on localized strings or layout heuristics.

ResearchLogAuditPreview (and any production host screens) declare a stable .a11yRoot for the research log surface and apply .nestedAccessibilityIdentifier(...) to key subviews such as headers, diagnostic lists, and status badges.
Accessibility snapshots or UI tests confirm identifiers follow the researchLogPreview.* naming pattern without collisions.

Documentation and TODO references are updated to point at the implemented identifiers, closing the outstanding @todo marker in ResearchLogAuditPreview.swift and marking todo.md item #13 as complete when shipped.
Identifiers must be ready when the preview is promoted into production screens (release R13).
Reuse conventions introduced for the parse tree explorer (e.g., lowercase slug segments) to keep identifier schemes consistent.
Extend ParseTreeAccessibilityIdentifierTests or add focused SwiftUI preview tests to assert presence of the new identifiers.

functional_units.name: ResearchLogAuditPreview UI
functional_units.description: Provides a preview interface for research log audits with nested accessibility identifiers.

functional_units.name: Nested Accessibility Identifier Assignment
functional_units.description: Applies .a11yRoot and .nestedAccessibilityIdentifier to key subviews such as headers, diagnostic lists, and status badges in the research log preview surface.

functional_units.name: Production Host Screen Integration
functional_units.description: Ensures production screens hosting the research log audit expose stable a11y identifiers following the researchLogPreview.* pattern.

functional_units.name: Accessibility Snapshot & UI Test Validation
functional_units.description: Runs accessibility snapshots or UI tests to confirm identifier naming and absence of collisions.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeAccessibilityIdentifierTests Extension
functional_units.description: Extends existing ParseTreeAccessibilityIdentifierTests or adds SwiftUI preview tests to assert presence of new identifiers.

functional_units.name: Documentation Update
functional_units.description: Updates documentation, TODO references, and closes @todo marker in ResearchLogAuditPreview.swift and todo.md item #13.
